name: Obsh
description:
As a dormitory manager, you must free several rooms, so you need to find a cause to kick the students out of them. Too much trash, cigarettes or alcohol would work.

Key mapping:

  • E to interact with items and doors.
  • SHIFT to run

Credits:

  • Peter Zakharkin (Programmer, Level Designer)
  • Vladislav Smirnov (Programmer, Level Designer, Composer)
  • Evgeny Romanov (Lead Programmer, Architect)
  • Ilshat Fatkhullin (Programmer)
